title: League causes a brief system lock (10+ seconds) after completing a game.
body:
Since the new event started, it may be the 8.13 patch as well, after a game has finished my system now locks after completing a match. Other processes stop responding until the vote screen appears, which is around 10 seconds, although once or twice has been nearly a minute and the vote screen does not appear at all.

Whether this is tied to the quests not updating or not I cannot say, but some quests fail to update after the game as well, including the First Win of The Day bonus.

replies.body:
Hey Montiness,

Can you run through the steps in the [Troubleshooting Lag or Low FPS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115007595768) Riot Support article? Let me know if that helps, or if the issue persists!

It most certainly does persist. load times to return to the client after a game have been steadily increasing since the release of the new client. Coupled with persistant issues like the loot or store failing to display on first access (needing to swap from loot-store and back or store-loot and back) the new client has gradually been becoming more and more unusable. Specs are:

AMD FX 8150
16GB DDR3
Windows 10 64 bit
Asus Nvidia GeForce 660ti
Asus Sabretooth 990fx R2 motherboard (fully updated firmware/software)
128G dedicated Windows Samsung 850 Pro SSD
Range of WD harddrives, league being on the WD Black 6TB games drive
